title: Behold Esports recruiting players for Iron to Gold tourney rosters
body:
Behold Esports Team Revamp ( Iron to Gold)

We are currently revamping our entire roster for Gold and majority Red. We are looking for very active and competitive players that want to learn and improve and do well in tournaments. We currently have 2 spots in Tesla League and Gold has 3 points in RR. We need players that are committed to trying and improving. If this sounds like you dm me :smile: Cheers
Requirements - 
Very good communication skills
Ability to work well in a team environment
Active for practises and tournaments

Havoc#4859

replies.body: Wouldn’t recommend this org for anyone that’s looking, dodgy and toxic
